data.actual_result: The send button doesn't unlock until you add a few characters.
data.expected_result: As you're taken to the add friend screen, the send button unlocks.
data.short_description: Accessing the Add friend screen via the quick switcher doesn't unlock the send button unless you type in more characters.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick switcher. - Type in nonsense stuff that gives no results. - Click on add friend.
